Posts.Content: I was told I could keep my dentures in,  as I was to have an epidural - and was given a pair of paper knickers to wear, as well as a gown. The knickers were blue and several sizes to small, so I wore my own. Got to the theater and was told I was getting a general anesthetic  - still woke up with my teeth in my mouth.
Posts.Title: Modesty during surgery
